text: Spermine synthase (, spermidine aminopropyltransferase, spermine synthetase) is an enzyme that converts spermidine into spermine. This enzyme catalyses the following chemical reaction : S-adenosylmethioninamine + spermidine \rightleftharpoons S-methyl-5'-thioadenosine + spermine == References == == External links == * * * Category:EC 2.5.1
title: Spermine synthase
